parameters.name: reps
parameters.description: Number of repetitions of the (10-stimulus) design

parameters.name: targsize
parameters.description: radius, in pixels, of target circles

parameters.name: leftcolor
parameters.description: Color name of left color.  Accepts hundreds of color names. See appendix of PEBL manual

parameters.name: rightcolor
parameters.description: Color name of right color.  Accepts hundreds of color names. See appendix of PEBL manual
